settings.database_bin_path_help: If your database binaries (e.g. mysqldump, pg_dump) are not in your system's PATH, you can specify the directory where they are located here. Make sure to include the trailing slash (e.g. /usr/local/mysql/bin/).

required-package-modal.title: A package is needed for {adapter}
required-package-modal.content: In order to use this driver you'll need to install a specific package. You can do so by running the following composer command: composer require {package} in your Flarum installation directory.

adapter-settings-modal.title: Configure {adapter}
adapter-settings-modal.timestamp_help: Specify the format for timestamps in backup filenames. The default is U (Unix timestamp). Uses PHP date formatting. Unsafe filename characters will be sanitized. The filename will be in the format {forum}-[formatted timestamp].zip.

host.label: Remote hostname
host.description: The hostname to connect to with FTP, eg: ftp.yourdomain.local.

username.label: Username
username.description: The username to authenticate with on the FTP server.

password.label: Password
password.description: The user password to authenticate with on the FTP server.

passive.description: Whether to use passive mode for the FTP connection.

root.label: Root path
root.description: The remote root path (subdirectory) to store backups in.

ssl.description: Whether to use an encrypted SSL connection to the server.

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.description: The number of seconds to wait for a connection with the FTP server.

private-key.label: Private Key
private-key.description: Path (preferably absolute) to a private key to use when authenticating the SFTP connection.

passphrase.label: Passphrase
passphrase.description: The passphrase for the private key, if applicable.

use-agent.description: Whether to use the SSH agent to authenticate the connection (default false).
